name: (Not) Christmas in Karkatland
description:
Any day of the year, every day of the year, can be Christmas!

Join Dave, Aranea, Vriska, Porrim and Ellsee in a quick trip to the Land of Blood and Magical Waste: Karkatland. A place in which it is said a catastrophe took place not long ago, turning everyone into corrupted versions of  Knight of Blood Karkat Vantas.

Make new friends and attend a neverending Christmas party. Get a first glimpse of what awaits you in Karkatland with this Holiday Special that is meant to be played any time of the year.

And don't forget, everyday can be Christmas!

This is a small glimpse of what's to come. Follow us in twitter for updates of our main project Karkpocalypse and join our discord!

For fans by fans.

Ellsee Raines from Vast Error.

Homestuck by Andrew Hussie.
